location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 90 of 1866 from Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire to Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter repeating the request made in No. 40 of 1866 to sell the Bughla that had belonged to the Shaikh of Bahrain and regarding the ongoing charges that are being incurred in keeping it as it is leaking.
